column4: argh... i've had ubuntu installed for the better part of a week, and i've STILL got no sound! :-(
try running alsamixer and unsetting the external speaker ...
that's what it's set to already
id say its a matter of playing with those settings till victory ... im on a mac just now so no chance to look 4 u
i've changed everything around several times :-\
seems like esd has trouble opening the card or something
try setting chmod 666 to /dev/dsp, or add your user to audio group
this is the main user account, it's got audio perms by default
hmm dunno then ...   does esd give errors when using it
after it says that last line it doesn't let go of the terminal
does dmesg show issues with sound after this
the last line is oops ?   if so does the rest of the system hang ?
no lol i said oops because i pasted so many lines
heh, thought the kernel was complaining
